Okay, 
To be bitterly honest, this game is a hot dumpster fire.  Ever since they made it free to play it's been riddled with cheaters.  If you want to make a new account in order to get out of silver because you've been hard stuck for years due to the rank update then you're going to lose and lose and lose because all you're faced with are hackers and teamed up with terribly toxic griefers who's only goal is to make that game the worst game of your life.  
All in all, unless you have a high trust factor play ESEA or Faceit if you're trying to have a serious time playing this game and want to climb the ranking system.  Other than that if you want to have the worst experience playing a FPS game then by all means play in low trust factor.
